0.sentence: this is Jane I'm the sales manager how can I help you

1.sentence: hello I received my package yet it's almost been a week and they are looking for it

2.sentence: I'm really sorry about that ma'am but first may I have your name please

3.sentence: this is Sarah Robert I need package by today packages to give to my friend and it's her birthday today

4.sentence: we're sorry for the delay and will try to take care of the issue what was the date of the order

5.sentence: I don't think that would help you just take my order number and deliver my product paying

6.sentence: ms Roberts if you tell me the date you place the order all check whether it has been sent or not I'm here to help you

7.sentence: %HESITATION all right the date of the order is temporary sixteen twenty fourteen

8.sentence: okay I've checked it your order has already been dispatched and it's scheduled to be delivered today

9.sentence: I hope so I'm tired of calling you guys again and again
